Flow.description: Sales2Support Case BeneTrac Cases Client Support Discrepancy Service Support 401k/S125 Case Service Premier Record Type Service Support Premier Safety Case Service Support HRO Case Service Support MSP Case Service Support PEO SC Case Service Support HR Services Job Desc Case Service Support TAA Case 10 April 2024 :- SFDC-26552 :- added the "Multi-Product Service Case" record type condition to send record to approval 23 April 2024: SFDC-27092:- Add the Serivce Help approval process criteria 26 April 2024 SFDC-27376:- Add the Entitlement Process criteria 1 May 2024 SFDC-27503:- Add filter for entitlements and PAC notifications 1 May 2024 SFDC-27504:- STM and TAA Notifications 2 May 2024 : Issue of milestones not being created. 10 May 2024 : Adding the creation of a task for MPSC. 15 May 2024: [OHM] Changing the recipients for Notifications TAA, STM, and PAC 23 May 2024:- Notification Recipient null check

formulas.name: PEOFollowUpDate
formulas.expression:
IF ({!$Record.Response_Time_in_Hours__c}=48,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+2, 1,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+2, 2,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+2, 3, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+2, 4, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+4, 5, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+3, 6, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+2, NULL),
IF ({!$Record.Response_Time_in_Hours__c}=72,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+3, 1,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+3, 2,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+3, 3, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+5, 4, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+5, 5, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+5, 6, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+4, NULL),
IF ({!$Record.Response_Time_in_Hours__c}=24,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+1, 1,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+1, 2,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+1, 3, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+1, 4, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+1, 5, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+3, 6, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+2, NULL),
IF ({!$Record.Response_Time_in_Hours__c}=120,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+5, 1,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+7, 2,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+7, 3, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+7, 4, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+7, 5, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+7, 6, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+6, NULL),
IF ({!$Record.Response_Time_in_Hours__c}=4 ||{!$Record.Response_Time_in_Hours__c}=8 ,
CASE(MOD((DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})) -DATE(1900,1,7),7),
0,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+1, 1,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate}), 2,DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate}), 3, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate}), 4, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate}), 5, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate}), 6, DATEVALUE({!$Record.CreatedDate})+2, NULL), NULL)))))

recordUpdates.description: Populates the follow up date. This has to be done in the after trigger because it leverages the Response_Time_in_Hours__c formula field which isn't available in the before trigger for doing a formula off of
recordUpdates.name: PEO_SC_Follow_up_Date
recordUpdates.label: PEO SC Follow-up Date

textTemplates.name: ClientSupportDiscrepancyChatter
textTemplates.text:
@[{!$Record.Account.Platinum_Rep_401K__r.User_Lookup__c}],
A discrepancy case has been created for {!$Record.Account.Name}, {!$Record.Contact.FirstName} {!$Record.Contact.LastName}. Discrepancy Reason: {!$Record.Discrepancy_Type__c} - {!$Record.Discrepancy_Sub_Type__c}.
